title: Linux insmod Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the insmod command in Linux, learn how to compile and insert kernel modules, and gain practical experience with real-world examples.

meta.title: Linux insmod Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the insmod command in Linux, learn how to compile and insert kernel modules, and gain practical experience with real-world examples.
meta.keywords: Linux, insmod, kernel module, system configuration, system settings, command-line tools

verify.name: Verify the "hello" kernel module is loaded
verify.hint: The 'hello' kernel module should be loaded in the kernel. Use the 'lsmod' command to check if the module is present.

verify.name: Verify the "hello2" kernel module is compiled
verify.hint: The 'hello2.o' object file should be present in the '~/project' directory after compiling the kernel module.

steps.title: Inserting a Kernel Module with insmod

verify.name: Verify the "hello2" kernel module is loaded
